name: Diana
description: Diana, goddess of the moon and the oak, watches over the sacred moon, forests, hunting, and childbirth.

skills.name: Lunar Illumination
skills.description: Launches a Moonlight Shockwave in a straight line, dealing DMG equal to 260% of ATK to enemies along the path.

upgrades.level2: Reduces the Armor of hit enemies by 20% for 5s.
upgrades.level3: Increases DMG dealt to 285% of ATK.
upgrades.level4: Reduces the Armor of hit enemies by 20% for 10s.

skills.name: Waxing Blessing
skills.description: Increases ATK SPD by 40% and Move SPD by 20% for all allies for 7s, and grants 15 Energy per second for the duration. Casts immediately at combat start.

upgrades.level3: Increases Energy gained per second to 20.

skills.name: Crescent’s Mark
skills.description: Permanently marks the enemy with the highest Armor, reducing their Armor by 20%.

upgrades.level3: Marked enemies also have their CRIT RES reduced by 10%.
upgrades.level4: Marked enemies now have their Armor reduced by 25%.

skills.name: Moonlit Ambush
skills.description: Diana launches 3 quick attacks. The first 2 attacks deal DMG equal to 50% of ATK, and the 3rd attack deals DMG equal to 150% of ATK.

upgrades.level2: Increases the last hit’s DMG to 170% of ATK.
upgrades.level3: The final hit is guaranteed to be a CRIT Hit.
upgrades.level4: Increases the last hit’s DMG to 200% of ATK.

relic.name: Selene’s Boon
relic.description: Blesses the ally with the highest ATK with moonlight. When the ally deals DMG, they deal extra DMG equal to 100% of Diana’s ATK to the target. Triggers once per second.

upgrades.level2: The first time Waxing Blessing is cast in battle, ATK SPD and Move SPD bonuses are doubled.
upgrades.level3: When either Diana or the moonlight-blessed ally casts an Ultimate, the other restores 100 Energy.
upgrades.level4: Extra DMG dealt is increased to 150% of Diana’s ATK.
